If you are interested in joining the Kansas LoCo team, please contact Kris Souma on Ubuntu Forums by clicking here: <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/private.php?do=newpm&u=179102|raqball]]</nowiki>

== Goals of the team ==

To provide support and to find ways to spread Ubuntu, Linux and open source. Let people know there are options worth considering. Helping more people understand that Ubuntu is ready for the desktop.

=== Please Join in ===

We are just starting this team, I know there are Ubuntu users in Kansas, please help out and spread open source.

Please join the mailing list.
https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/Ubuntu-us-ks

Our forum on Ubuntuforums.org is at:
http://kansas.ubuntuforums.org
